text: Yuri Alekseevich Ryzhov (; October 28, 1930 - July 29, 2017) was a Soviet and Russian scientist in the field of fluid dynamics, political and social activist. He was born in Moscow. He was a member of the Russian Academy of Sciences (Academician since 1987; Corresponding Member since 1981). He served as Russian Ambassador to France from 1992 through 1998.[1] Ryzhov died on July 29, 2017 in Moscow at the age of 86.Умер академик Юрий Рыжов ==References== ==Other websites== * Biography on the website of the Russian Pugwash Committee at the Presidium of the Russian Academy of Sciences Category:1930 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Scientists from Moscow Category:Ambassadors of Russia Category:Politicians from Moscow Category:Soviet politicians
